item.description:
For this Meet-up we will return to the Pell Chafee Performing Center for Brown University's production of "Macbeth." Here is their description of this famous Shakespearean play:

Shakespeare's revenge tragedy takes us deep into Scotland's haunted moors and castles.  A mysterious prophesy yields murderous consequences as Macbeth hatches a plot to ascend to the Scottish throne sooner rather than later.  As a crescendo of grief and guilt builds in equal measure to the body count, Macbeth may soon find that he is no match for what the future has in store.

Ticket Information

Tickets are $10. Seating is General Admission.
Each person is responsible for purchasing their own ticket. For reservations, please visit Trinity Box Office or call 401-351-4242.

Please Note that this performance will likely sell out early. Please do not wait to order your tickets! I strongly recommend that you order your tickets now.

Meet-up Logistics

We will meet just outside the theater on Empire Street.  The doors typically open at 7:00.  Since this is General Admission, it's important to be on-time so we can all sit together.  I will provide my cell phone number when you RSVP.  Please call me if you are running late.
item.how_to_find_us: In front of the theater on Empire Street
item.name: Macbeth
